product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Kriti Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Shoulder seasons bring unpredictable weather, so when the day calls for just a little something between you and the elements, choose the Kriti Soft-Shell Jacket from Sherpa Adventure Gear. Breathable, soft and stretchy, the Kriti Jacket resists wind and water. Fit is meant to be close, so there's no drag to slow you down. Front zipper is asymmetrical from chest to chin for comfort. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Hand and single chest pocket zip closed; chest zipper adds color for pop. Sherpa Adventure Gear Kriti Jacket offers thumbhole cuffs and an adjustable hem for extra weather protection. Closeout.
short_description: Shoulder seasons bring unpredictable weather, so when the day calls for just a little something between you and the elements, choose the Kriti Soft-Shell Jacket from Sherpa Adventure Gear.
